column2: BRIEF-National Health Investors Posts Q1 EPS Of $1.37 May 11 (Reuters) - National Health Investors Inc: * NATIONAL HEALTH INVESTORS SAYS Q1 2020 GAAP NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS OF $1.37 PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE - SEC FILING * Q1 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.39 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA Source:(bit.ly/3cmHsUM) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-NHI Confirms 44 Active Resident Cases Of Covid-19 In Its Nursing & Senior Housing Portfolio April 1 (Reuters) - National Health Investors Inc: * NATIONAL HEALTH INVESTORS -AS OF MARCH 31, NHI CONFIRMED 44 ACTIVE RESIDENT CASES OF COVID-19 IN ITS NURSING & SENIOR HOUSING PORTFOLIO Source text: bit.ly/3aMQbys Further company coverage:

BRIEF-National Health Investors Files For Mixed Shelf Offering March 19 (Reuters) - National Health Investors Inc: * NATIONAL HEALTH INVESTORS FILES FOR MIXED SHELF OFFERING; SIZE NOT DISCLOSED - SEC FILING Source text: (‍here ) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-National Health Investors Enters Equity Distribution Agreement March 19 (Reuters) - National Health Investors Inc: * NATIONAL HEALTH INVESTORS INC - ENTERED EQUITY DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT * NATIONAL HEALTH INVESTORS INC - MAY OFFER & SELL SHARES HAVING SALES PRICE OF UP TO $500 MILLION Source : (bit.ly/3a0fTzj) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-National Health Investors Says Will Increase Quarterly Dividend By 5.0% To $1.1025 Per Common Share Feb 19 (Reuters) - National Health Investors Inc: * NATIONAL HEALTH INVESTORS INC - ANNOUNCES INCREASE IN Q1 2020 DIVIDEND * NATIONAL HEALTH INVESTORS INC - WILL INCREASE ITS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND BY 5.0% TO $1.1025 PER COMMON SHARE Source: (bit.ly/3bTrrWw) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-National Health Investors Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share Of $1.30 Feb 19 (Reuters) - National Health Investors Inc: * SAYS NORMALIZED FFO FOR 2020 TO BE IN RANGE OF $5.67 TO $5.71 PER SHARE * SAYS NORMALIZED AFFO FOR 2020 TO BE IN RANGE OF $5.31 TO $5.35 PER SHARE Source: (bit.ly/32cQgZ8) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-National Health Investors Reports Q1 Adjusted FFO Per Share Of $1.35 May 8 (Reuters) - National Health Investors Inc: * EXPECTS NORMALIZED FFO FOR 2018 TO BE IN RANGE OF $5.45 TO $5.51 PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE * EXPECTS NORMALIZED AFFO TO BE IN RANGE OF $4.99 TO $5.03 PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE FOR 2018 * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $5.50 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-NHI Acquires 5 Assisted Living And Memory Care Communities For $69.75 Million May 1 (Reuters) - National Health Investors Inc: * NHI ACQUIRES 5 ASSISTED LIVING AND MEMORY CARE COMMUNITIES FOR $69.75 MILLION * NATIONAL HEALTH INVESTORS INC - PURCHASE WAS FUNDED WITH A DRAW ON NHI’S REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
